PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2005-01672005-02-10,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisAppointment of PETER HERRNDORF of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, in the place of L. Richard O'Hagan, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
